Title says it all.

title: Ask me anything

replies.body:
Welcome to the forums mate!
I'll kick this off with a generic question, how did you come up with your username?
replies.body_tagged:
Welcome to the forums mate!
I'll kick this off with a generic question, how did you come up with your username?

replies.body: When I first got my Nintendo DSI I needed to create a username, so I thought long and hard and eventually came up with mw46. MW are my first name initials and I decided to put 46 at the end because IDK why. When I first went on to Minecraft and I tried to use the username "mw46" it was too short so I added the 3 at the end and that was how I came up with my username.
replies.body_tagged: When I first got my Nintendo DSI I needed to create a username, so I thought long and hard and eventually came up with mw46. MW are my first name initials and I decided to put 46 at the end because IDK why. When I first went on to Minecraft and I tried to use the username "mw46" it was too short so I added the 3 at the end and that was how I came up with my username.
